thread.title: Second round of Senior Azalea golf cancelled
thread.title_full: Second round of Senior Azalea golf cancelled

title: Second round of Senior Azalea golf cancelled
text: Second round of Senior Azalea golf cancelled because of heavy rains Staff reports Facebook @postandcourier Oct 1 2015 2:58 pm Fridayâ€™s heavy rains forced cancellation of the second round of the Senior Azalea Invitational golf tournament. Players will return Friday in hopes of finding playable conditions for a final round. The scheduled 54-hole tournament is for amateur golfers 55 and older. Kirk Geiling of Loveland, Ohio and Walter Todd of Laurens were the first-day leaders after shooting 2-under-par 69s. Four-time defending champion Brady Exber of Las Vegas was tied for 10th after shooting 72. Mike Weiner of Kiawah Island led the Super Senior division for players 65 and older after shooting 69. Keywords
